samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: A simple calendar control for JavaScript(ES5) to select dates easily by switching between month, year, and decade views with a rich user interface

samples.name: Disabled Dates
samples.description: Calendar widget for Javascript(ES5) with disabled dates to restrict the user from selecting a defined set of dates by disabling its UI interaction

samples.name: Date Range
samples.description: Calendar for JavaScript(ES5) with min and max dates that restrict users from selecting dates outside a defined range, like weekends, range of dates etc

samples.name: Special Dates
samples.description: Calendar for JavaScript(ES5) that highlights multiple dates like weekends, or a range of days with options to add custom styles and descriptions

samples.name: Multiple Selection
samples.description: A simple and lightweight calendar control for JavaScript(ES5) that features multiple date selection to allow users to select more than one date

samples.name: Month Picker
samples.description: The JavaScript(ES5) Calendar control can act as a month and year picker. It helps you to select a month or year quickly with all month related properties.
